Home / Projects / Ara

Ara

Implementation

Parsing

The Ara compiler uses a handwritten LL(1) recursive descent parser.

Code Generation

The Ara compiler emits LLVM IR.

Source

Ara is written in C#. The source code is available on GitHub.

License

Ara uses the Zero-Clause BSD license.
